  • British Library Mets/Alto importer
  • View page source

British Library Mets/Alto importer

This importer extends the generic Mets/Alto importer, and it was developed to handle OCR newspaper data provided by the British Library.

Custom classes

class text_importer.importers.bl.classes.BlNewspaperIssue(issue_dir: IssueDirectory)
class text_importer.importers.bl.classes.BlNewspaperPage(_id: str, number: int, filename: str, basedir: str, encoding: str = 'utf-8')
add_issue(issue: MetsAltoNewspaperIssue)

Adds the given BlNewspaperIssue as an attribute for this class

Parameters:

issue (BlNewspaperIssue) –

Detect functions

text_importer.importers.bl.detect.BlIssueDir

alias of IssueDirectory

text_importer.importers.bl.detect.detect_issues(base_dir: str, access_rights: str, tmp_dir: str) → List[IssueDirectory]

Detect newspaper issues to import within the filesystem.

This function expects the directory structure that the BL used to organize the dump of Mets/Alto OCR data.

Parameters:

  • base_dir (str) – Path to the base directory of newspaper data. (For BL this dir should contain zip files)

  • access_rights (str) – Not used for this imported, but argument is kept for normality

  • tmp_dir (str) – Temporary directory to unzip archives

Returns:

List of BlIssueDir instances, to be imported.

text_importer.importers.bl.detect.dir2issue(path: str) → IssueDirectory | None

Given the BLIP directory of an issue, this function returns the corresponding IssueDirectory.

Parameters:

blip_dir (str) – The BLIP directory path

Returns:

BlIssueDir The corresponding Issue

text_importer.importers.bl.detect.select_issues(base_dir: str, config: dict, access_rights: str) → List[IssueDirectory] | None

Detect selectively newspaper issues to import.

The behavior is very similar to detect_issues() with the only difference that config specifies some rules to filter the data to import. See this section for further details on how to configure filtering.

Parameters:

  • base_dir (str) – Path to the base directory of newspaper data.

  • config (dict) – Config dictionary for filtering.

  • access_rights (str) – Path to access_rights.json file.

Returns:

List of BlIssueDir instances, to be imported.
